name: Max Payne
info:
• 简体中文名: 马克思·佩恩
  • 别名: 小马哥
  • 性别: 男
  • 生日: 1964
detail: Max Payne is an American police detective and the titular main protagonist of the Max Payne series who goes on a violent, rogue, nearly unstoppable, tenacious, and relentless killing spree against felons, spanning a number of nights, all the while looking for truth to mysteries he finds in his life but mercilessly bringing death to all those who ever caused him pain.
